name: Insurance
description: The IN1 segment contains insurance policy coverage information necessary to produce properly pro-rated and patient and insurance bills. Multiple IN1 segments may be included in a message to communicate multiple insurance policies for the same patient, with IN1.1 indicating the sequence/priority of the insurance coverage.

cardinality.note: Multiple IN1 segments can appear for multiple insurance policies with different priorities

IN1.1.name: Set ID - IN1
IN1.1.description: This field contains the number that identifies this insurance transaction. For the first occurrence of the segment, the sequence number shall be one (1 = primary insurance), two (2 = secondary insurance), etc.
IN1.1.generationHint: Sequential priority number: 1 = primary, 2 = secondary, 3 = tertiary

IN1.2.name: Insurance Plan ID
IN1.2.description: This field contains the insurance company's plan identification. This field is used to identify the insurance plan under which the patient is covered.

IN1.3.name: Insurance Company ID
IN1.3.description: This field contains the insurance company identifier. This is typically a payer ID used for electronic billing and claim processing.

IN1.4.name: Insurance Company Name
IN1.4.description: This field contains the name of the insurance company. This is used for identification and billing purposes.

IN1.5.name: Insurance Company Address
IN1.5.description: This field contains the insurance company's address. Used for billing and correspondence purposes.

IN1.6.name: Insurance Co Contact Person
IN1.6.description: This field contains the name of the insurance company contact person. Used for inquiries and claim resolution.

IN1.7.name: Insurance Co Phone Number
IN1.7.description: This field contains the insurance company's phone number. Used for inquiries and prior authorizations.

IN1.8.name: Group Number
IN1.8.description: This field contains the group number under which the insured is covered. This is typically the employer group number or plan group identifier.

IN1.9.name: Group Name
IN1.9.description: This field contains the name of the group under which the insured is covered. This is typically the employer name or organization name.
IN1.9.generationHint: Organization name format, typically employer or group sponsor name

IN1.10.name: Insured's Group Emp ID
IN1.10.description: This field contains the insured person's employee identification number as assigned by the group or employer.

IN1.11.name: Insured's Group Emp Name
IN1.11.description: This field contains the name of the employer or group under which the insured is covered.

IN1.12.name: Plan Effective Date
IN1.12.description: This field contains the date on which the insurance plan becomes effective for this insured person.
IN1.12.generationHint: Format: YYYYMMDD, typically current year or earlier

IN1.13.name: Plan Expiration Date
IN1.13.description: This field contains the date on which the insurance plan expires for this insured person.
IN1.13.generationHint: Format: YYYYMMDD, should be after IN1.12 effective date

IN1.14.name: Authorization Information
IN1.14.description: This field contains authorization information required for services, procedures, or referrals under this insurance plan.
IN1.14.generationHint: Authorization number format: AUTH123456 or PREAUTH789012

IN1.15.name: Plan Type
IN1.15.description: This field indicates the type of insurance plan. Values from user-defined table 0086 - plan type.
IN1.15.generationHint: Most common: HMO, PPO, POS, IND for commercial insurance

IN1.16.name: Name Of Insured
IN1.16.description: This field contains the name of the insured person. This may be different from the patient if the patient is a dependent.
IN1.16.generationHint: Name of primary insured (may be patient or subscriber)

IN1.17.name: Insured's Relationship To Patient
IN1.17.description: This field describes the relationship of the insured person to the patient. Values from user-defined table 0063 - relationship.
IN1.17.generationHint: Most common: SEL (self), SPO (spouse), CHD (child), PAR (parent)

IN1.18.name: Insured's Date Of Birth
IN1.18.description: This field contains the date of birth of the insured person. Used for identification and verification purposes.
IN1.18.generationHint: Format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS, often just date portion used

IN1.19.name: Insured's Address
IN1.19.description: This field contains the address of the insured person. May be different from the patient address if the patient is a dependent.

IN1.20.name: Assignment Of Benefits
IN1.20.description: This field indicates whether benefits are assigned to the provider. Values: Y (benefits assigned), N (benefits not assigned).
IN1.20.generationHint: Usually Y for institutional claims, varies for professional claims

IN1.21.name: Coordination Of Benefits
IN1.21.description: This field indicates the coordination of benefits priority when multiple insurance policies exist. Values from user-defined table 0173.
IN1.21.generationHint: CO when multiple insurances coordinate benefits, IN when independent

IN1.22.name: Coord Of Ben. Priority
IN1.22.description: This field contains the coordination of benefits priority number. Used when IN1.21 indicates coordination.

IN1.23.name: Notice Of Admission Flag
IN1.23.description: This field indicates whether the insurance company requires notification of admission. Values: Y (notification required), N (notification not required).
IN1.23.generationHint: Y for managed care plans, N for indemnity plans typically

IN1.24.name: Notice Of Admission Date
IN1.24.description: This field contains the date by which the insurance company must be notified of admission.
IN1.24.generationHint: Format: YYYYMMDD, typically admission date or within 24-48 hours

IN1.25.name: Report Of Eligibility Flag
IN1.25.description: This field indicates whether eligibility has been verified with the insurance company. Values: Y (verified), N (not verified).
IN1.25.generationHint: Y when real-time eligibility check completed successfully

IN1.26.name: Report Of Eligibility Date
IN1.26.description: This field contains the date on which eligibility was verified with the insurance company.
IN1.26.generationHint: Format: YYYYMMDD, date of eligibility verification

IN1.27.name: Release Information Code
IN1.27.description: This field indicates whether the patient has authorized release of information to the insurance company. Values: Y (authorized), N (not authorized).

validValues.description: Informed consent to release information for conditions related to payment

IN1.27.generationHint: Usually Y or I for billing purposes, N requires special handling

IN1.28.name: Pre-Admit Cert (PAC)
IN1.28.description: This field contains the pre-admission certification number when required by the insurance plan.
IN1.28.generationHint: Certification number format: PAC123456, CERT789012, or similar

examples: IN1|1|BCBS^Blue Cross Blue Shield^LOCAL|12345^^^PI|BLUE CROSS BLUE SHIELD OF OHIO|123 INSURANCE WAY^^COLUMBUS^OH^43215^USA|JONES^MARY^A||8005551234^WPN^PH|GRP123456|ABC CORPORATION|EMP987654^^^EI|ABC CORPORATION|20220101|20231231||HMO|DOE^JOHN^Q|SEL^Self^HL70063|19801015|123 MAIN ST^^CLEVELAND^OH^44101^USA|Y|CO|1|Y|20220815|Y|20220815|Y|PAC123456
notes: IN1 segment can appear multiple times for multiple insurance policies
IN1.1 (Set ID) indicates insurance priority: 1 = primary, 2 = secondary, etc.
IN1.2 (Insurance Plan ID) and IN1.3 (Insurance Company ID) are required
Coordination of benefits (IN1.21-IN1.22) is crucial for proper claim processing
Prior authorization information (IN1.14, IN1.28) is important for managed care plans
Eligibility verification flags (IN1.25-IN1.26) help ensure coverage before service

conditional.IN1.4: Should be provided for insurance company identification
conditional.IN1.16: Required if insured is different from patient
conditional.IN1.22: Should be present if IN1.21 = CO
conditional.IN1.24: Should be present if IN1.23 = Y
conditional.IN1.26: Should be present if IN1.25 = Y

relationships.IN1.12_IN1.13: Expiration date must be after effective date if both present
relationships.IN1.21_IN1.22: COB priority should be present if coordination = CO
relationships.IN1.23_IN1.24: Admission notification date should align with flag
relationships.IN1.25_IN1.26: Eligibility verification date should align with flag

validation.IN1.15: Must be valid user-defined table 0086 plan type code
validation.IN1.17: Must be valid user-defined table 0063 relationship code
validation.IN1.20: Must be Y or N if present
validation.IN1.21: Must be valid user-defined table 0173 COB code
validation.IN1.23: Must be Y or N if present
validation.IN1.25: Must be Y or N if present
validation.IN1.27: Must be valid information release code
